content: X-ENP Metal deck fasteners Single nail for fastening metal decks to steel structures with powder-actuated nailers ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features A much faster and safer fastening system compared to welding Fully knurled tip provides high holding capacity High application limits – can be used on steel with a thickness of at least 6 mm (1/4) Proven system and has several worldwide approvals for siding and decking No predrilling required, even on thick steel Applications Fastening metal roof decks to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) for composite decking Fastening metal roof decks to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) for roofing Fastening metal roof decks to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) for siding For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 1/4 in Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 1/4 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.18 in | Washer size | 19/32 in | Point type | Ballistic point | Approvals | ABS, ETA, FM, IAPMO, ICC-ES, ITB, LR, MLIT, SDI, UL | For use with (tools) | DX 76 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 283506 - Sheet metal nail X-ENP-19 L15 - Package Size 100 pc
